summary: REQ-8 is only partially evidenced. LandingPage.tsx shows one newly referenced generated image (warm-texture-1...), but the diff does not add any new image files under frontend/public/assets/generated, and the new shown uses an empty alt attribute, which fails the descriptive-alt requirement. Due to truncation, additional sections/images cannot be confirmed from the provided code excerpt.

evidence: frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx references /assets/generated/warm-texture-1.dim_1600x900.png (but asset not shown as added)
